means: 下决心( decide的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She had decided to confront Kathryn with what she had learnt.
sentence.Network_cn: 她决定拿自己了解的事实与凯瑟琳当面对证。

sentence.Network_en: He decided on roast chicken and vegetables, with apple pie to follow.
sentence.Network_cn: 他决定点烤鸡配蔬菜，然后再要一份苹果派。

sentence.Network_en: They took a vote and decided not to do it.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们进行了表决，决定放弃。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英文字根单词 ... （syn+drome 跑→跑到一起→综合症） （un+decided 决定的） 77. （trans+continental 大陆的）.
The new evidence decided her ., 新证据使她下了决心.
英语描写人的形容词汇集_百度文库 ... disciplined 守纪律的 decided 果断的；坚决的 dedicated 有奉献精神的；.
铁字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 铁板〖 ironplate;sheetiron〗 铁板钉钉〖 decided〗 铁板一块〖 amonolithicbloc;ofonecut〗.

list.abs: 七年级英语单词表 ... back 回原处;往回去 decide 决定;下决心 wall 墙壁;围墙;城墙.
大学英语四级单词集锦 D 开头_百度文库 ... decent a. 正派的；体面的 decide vt. 决定，决心；解决 decision n. 决定，决心；果断.
you decide when others are delaying ., 当别人耽搁时你决定.
决胜局(Decider)云博国际一路(Way)抢先终极以3-2险胜浙江，五局比分(Score)分别是26-24、25-23、22-25、22-25和15-11。云博国 …
跪求一好听歌曲！~_百度知道 ... (凯莉克拉克森)-（因为你） because of you (我决定) I Decided （燃烧） burning.

entry.tran: 确实无疑的;明白无误的;明显的

example.ex: Her ignorance of the area put her at a decided disadvantage...
example.tran: 她对该地区一无所知，这显然对她不利。

example.ex: He's a man of very decided opinions.

auth_sentence.content: We've decided to retire him as of today.
auth_sentence.res_content: We've decided to retire him as of today.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We've decided to retire him as of today.

auth_sentence.content: I work nearby and decided to watch the parade.
auth_sentence.res_content: I work nearby and decided to watch the parade.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I work nearby and decided to watch the parade.

auth_sentence.content: We decided to take a 'mobile first' approach.
auth_sentence.res_content: We decided to take a 'mobile first' approach.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We decided to take a 'mobile first' approach.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,通常在动词后,"有……的,被……的"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通常的,习惯的,按照风俗习惯的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accustom使习惯+ed有……的,被……的→通常的,习惯的
ally同盟者+ed有……的,被……的→allied联合的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 耕耘的,有教养的,栽植的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cultivate耕耘,栽植+ed有……的,被……的→cultivated耕耘的
harden变硬+ed有……的,被……的→adj.变硬的,坚毅的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受伤的,受损害的,受委屈的
感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest兴趣,关心+ed有……的,被……的→adj.感兴趣的,有成见的,有权益的
limit限制+ed有……的,被……的→adj.有限的,被限制的
note注意到+ed有……的,被……的→被注意的→著名的
pack打包+ed有……的,被……的→adj.充满……的,塞满了……的
repeat重复,反复+ed有……的,被……的→adj.重复的,再三的
suppose猜想,推测+ed有……的,被……的→adj.假定的,假像的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wick+ed有……的,被……的→adj.坏的,邪恶的,缺德的,不道德的
fix固定+ed有……的,被……的→adj.固定的,确定的

Sentence.sentence: Second, Americans have basically decided that they don't really want to produce all their own oil.
But democratically decided and students are expected to attend
I decided to write about cross-country skiing.
The man has decided to quit his computer class
The fine points of the law are decided by the courts and by acceptable common practice overtime
An influential figure decided to move from the countryside to the city.

means.word_mean: 清楚的, 明确的, 肯定的

sentences.en: This gave them a decided advantage over their opponents.
sentences.cn: 这使他们比对手具有明显的优势。

means.word_mean: 坚决的, 坚定的, 决定了的

sentences.en: He spoke in a decided tone.
